text: Michele Cremonesi (born 15 April 1988) is an Italian professional footballer who plays for Venezia as a centre-back. ==International== He represented Italy at the 2005 UEFA European Under-17 Football Championship (3rd place) and the 2005 FIFA U-17 World Championship. ==External links== * Career summary by playerhistory.com * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Italian footballers Category:Italy under-21 international footballers Category:Italy youth international footballers Category:U.S. Cremonese players Category:F.C.
